Event.Message:
%5
Virtual Address: %2 Physical Address: %3 Corruption Window Size: %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DataMgr" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="VirtualAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="PhysicalAddress" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Size" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="FileBacked" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="CorruptionType" inType="win:UInt8" outType="xs:unsignedByte"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: A ReadyBoost cache failed to persist across boot. This may happen if the cache device was modified on another computer or if this computer was booted into another operating system.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="FailReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FailStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="ObjectPathLength" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="ObjectPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="ObjectPathLength"/> </template>
